akas: Xia Yi Zhan, Xing Fu Taiwan
Next Stop, Happiness World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Xia Yi Zhan, Xing Fu Taiwan
Next Stop, Happiness World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: 1st Stop
1.plot: Liang Mu Cheng loses her chance to enter college when one of her delivery jobs goes horribly wrong, thanks to Ren Guang Xi, a notorious and wealthy playboy with little cares in the world.

2.title: 2nd Stop
2.plot: Ren Guang Xi softens as he finds himself attracted to Liang Mu Cheng. Unfortunately, there are more than a few people out for revenge against him.

3.title: 3rd Stop
3.plot: Uncle Cai makes his move, forcing Ren Guang Xi to step forward and fight to protect Liang Mu Cheng and clear her name.

4.title: 4th Stop
4.plot: The truth hearing begins and it's a race against the clock to find the evidence to clear Liang Mu Cheng's name.

5.title: 5th Stop
5.plot: Facing a grim prognosis, Ren Guang Xi is no longer certain about the future of his relationship with Liang Mu Cheng. His mother continues to search for a way to save him.

6.title: 6th Stop
6.plot: Liang Mu Cheng and Ren Guang Xi spend one final day together before the big operation.

7.title: 7th Stop
7.plot: Mu Cheng lives a quiet life by the countryside with Xiao Le, her sickly son. Guang Xi has moved on to become a successful lawyer.

8.title: 8th Stop
8.plot: When the lawsuit against Hua Tien Village goes underway, Mu Cheng finds herself facing the one man she never expected to see again.

9.title: 9th Stop
9.plot: Although conflicted about his loyalties, Guang Xi does his best to help the distressed residents of Hua Tien Village.

10.title: 10th Stop
10.plot: It's Parents Day at Xiao Le's kindergarten. To win Tang Tang's affections, he has made a bet with Hua Hong that rests on Uncle Guang Xi.

11.title: 11th Stop
11.plot: Guang Xi has a change of heart and decides to help the village people with their case.

12.title: 12th Stop
12.plot: Guang Xi can't shake off the feeling that he's met Mu Cheng before. Yi Qian comes to Hua Tien to pick Guang Xi up, and notices his close bond with Xiao Le.

13.title: 13th Stop
13.plot: Guang Xi leaves the village temporarily to return to Taipei for his upcoming wedding but Xiao Le isn't happy to see him go.

14.title: 14th Stop
14.plot: Guang Xi stumbles across some photos from his past, which sets the floodgates open, leaving everyone with some very hard questions to face.

15.title: 15th Stop
15.plot: Tuo Ye does his best to protect Mu Cheng, but Guang Xi still has the upper hand in the fight for Xiao Le's custody.

16.title: 16th Stop
16.plot: Mu Cheng and Xiao Le settle into their new life in the city. Guang Xi, however, is in for a bumpy ride as he starts to come under fire when an old court case comes back to haunt him.

17.title: 17th Stop
17.plot: Mu Cheng is accidentally attacked and ends up in the hospital. Guang Xi tries to rekindle his past romance with Mu Cheng.

18.title: 18th Stop
18.plot: Mu Cheng is tested once again when Guang Xi unexpectedly takes on a case for a client from his past.

19.title: 19th Stop
19.plot: Tuo Ye does the unthinkable in order to save Ci Xing. Meanwhile, Guang Xi and Mu Cheng continue to misunderstand one another.

20.title: 20th Stop
20.plot: Tuo Ye's trial gets underway. Later, unexpected developments shock the court. Outside of the courtroom, a surprising revelation sets Guang Xi aback.

21.title: 21st Stop
21.plot: In this surprising conclusion of Autumn's Concerto, Guang Xi and Mu Cheng are forced to resolve their issues when Xiao Le is kidnapped.

imdb.plot outline: Ren Guang Xi, a cocky law student, seems to lead the perfect life. He's the sole successor to a huge and famous business and a talented ice hockey player. But in reality, his lonely life lacks joy, laughter and motivation. That is until he meets Liang Mu Cheng, the new bento seller at his school canteen. Although orphaned at a young age, Mu Cheng does not let her past affect her and lives life with great passion and determination. A harmless bet brings the two together and Guang Xi slowly changes as Mu Cheng teaches him how to give and love. Tragedy strikes when Guang Xi suddenly has to go through a major brain surgery which causes him to lose his memory. His mother begs Mu Cheng to leave him and the latter has no choice but to do so. Little does she know that she already has Guang Xi's child. Six years pass. Mu Cheng lives a quiet life with her young son in the countryside while Guang Xi is now a successful lawyer and is engaged to He Yi Qian, the kind and beautiful doctor who took care of him after his surgery. A strangely familiar piano piece stirs Guang Xi's heart as he struggles to recall his past romance with Mu Cheng. How will the couple make up for six years of lost time? Happiness, which stop do I alight at?
imdb.title: Autumn's Concerto
plot: Ren Guang Xi, a cocky law student, seems to lead the perfect life. He's the sole successor to a huge and famous business and a talented ice hockey player. But in reality, his lonely life lacks joy, laughter and motivation. That is until he meets Liang Mu Cheng, the new bento seller at his school canteen. Although orphaned at a young age, Mu Cheng does not let her past affect her and lives life with great passion and determination. A harmless bet brings the two together and Guang Xi slowly changes as Mu Cheng teaches him how to give and love. Tragedy strikes when Guang Xi suddenly has to go through a major brain surgery which causes him to lose his memory. His mother begs Mu Cheng to leave him and the latter has no choice but to do so. Little does she know that she already has Guang Xi's child. Six years pass. Mu Cheng lives a quiet life with her young son in the countryside while Guang Xi is now a successful lawyer and is engaged to He Yi Qian, the kind and beautiful doctor who took care of him after his surgery. A strangely familiar piano piece stirs Guang Xi's heart as he struggles to recall his past romance with Mu Cheng. How will the couple make up for six years of lost time? Happiness, which stop do I alight at?::TheTVDB
synopsis: The story started when Liang Mu-Cheng (Ady An) met Ren Kuang-Hsi (Vanness Wu) the rich playboy who uphold justice without truly showing it to other people. Mu-Cheng and Kuang-Hsi met by accident and left bad impression for the two, by coincidence Mu-Cheng's family which only left with her step mom and step dad (her father died so she followed her step mom) worked in the university's cafeteria owned by Kuang-Hsi's mom (his father suicide when he was small he always blamed his mom because of that) hence those two met again. Mu-Cheng was a soft kind heart girl touched Kuang-Hsi's lonely and tormented heart and the latter promised to always protect her no matter what happen. Mu-Cheng's step dad was a crazy old maniac whom continuously harassing her until one day he tried to rape her but her step mom got in the right time but didn't believe of Mu-Cheng's innocence, Kuang-Hsi who came late knew what happened beat the old maniac and the school decided for the "truth hearing commission" like the court system but it's inside university not on public, Kuang-Hsi who didn't graduate his law school until his 4th year decided to become Mu-Cheng's lawyer and worked together with Hua Tuo-Ye (Kang Ren Wu) (Mu-Cheng's friend who had a long time crush for her but never been reciprocate back) hence prove Mu-Cheng's innocence. Then Kuang-Hsi was having this tumor forced him to break up with Mu-Cheng before they even started dating but he realized that Mu-Cheng could accept him then those two fighting together for his well being. More drama until Mu-Cheng forced to leave Kuang-Hsi but she was pregnant. 6 years passed let the faith make Mu-Cheng, the amnesic Kuang-Hsi and their son met together again those two love never vanish but Kuang-Hsi didn't remember her and she was pretending not knowing him but their son immediately recognized Kuang-Hsi as his father, the bond between father and son changed Kuang-Hsi became different person and knowing Mu-Cheng again who he thought never met before brought his old self back before he had amnesia after the brain surgery. Things changed when Kuang-Hsi got his memory back and forced Mu-Cheng to marry her.
